sentences: Tavaliselt ma tõstan kell kuus üles.
Meie perekond tavaliselt sööb koos õhtul.
context: The word 'tavaliselt' is an adverb in Estonian that indicates something happens most of the time or under normal circumstances. It's commonly used to describe habitual actions or typical situations. The word comes from 'tavane' (usual/normal) with the adverb-forming suffix '-lt'.
